title: Esty Deez
creator_credit: Tom McPartland, Sabina Wynn and New South Wales. Dept. of Health
brief_description: A frank look at the importance of using condoms to prevent sexually transmited diseases. Discusses the dangers of having multiple sexual partners and what should be done if an STD is contracted. Depicts the behaviour of adolescents together with contemporary language to ensure the attention of the intended audience. NB: TEACHER PREVIEW PRIOR TO CLASSROOM VIEWING IS RECOMMENDED.
